subject: Errors on your Kinsta-hosted site
preview: Hello Andy,  We've detected a high number of "Connection timed out - Error code 522" errors on the following sites:  • absolutecoolrooms • creativegenerals • csgdalligatorcomau • dalligator ?

action.text: Workflow **Notifications moved to Alerts Inbox** was triggered

full_threads.body:
Hello Andy,

We've detected a high number of "Connection timed out - Error code 522"
errors on the following sites:

• absolutecoolrooms
• creativegenerals
• csgdalligatorcomau
• dalligator
• drpanth
• drshiva
• littlealliedhealth
• optivia
• stockandnoble
• tsn2024

The issue is caused by proxied CNAME DNS records at Cloudflare being
configured to point to your domain rather than
sitename.hosting.kinsta.cloud.

What that means is that in one or more of your Cloudflare DNS CNAME
entries, the "Content" field is:

yoursite.com

When it should be:

yoursite.hosting.kinsta.cloud

(*The field is named "Content" when viewing your DNS records at Cloudflare,
and "Target" when editing the CNAME record.*)

The misconfiguration typically affects www CNAMEs, but other subdomains
could also be misconfigured.

The Cloudflare DNS configuration may have been incorrect for the above
site(s) for some time, but we're seeing the errors now due to recent
configuration changes that Cloudflare made. Correcting the DNS
configuration at Cloudflare should stop the errors. (If you have fixed the
issue at some point during the past two weeks, you can disregard this
email.)

As always, we appreciate you being a Kinsta client. If you have questions,
don't hesitate to reply to this email or contact us in MyKinsta. We’re here
to answer your questions around the clock.


The Kinsta Team
You are receiving this email because you have an account at Kinsta.
